Goldman Sachs.eligibility: 3rd or Final year (all engineering branches), MCA, BCA, BSc, MSc
Goldman Sachs.Key note/How to prepare: Competition is brutal with very high cut-offs.
Goldman Sachs.preparation strategy: Focus on solving LeetCode contests very fast.

Goldman Sachs-2.preparation strategy: Watch specific hiring process videos to understand the interview structure.

Google.Key note/How to prepare: Shortlisting requires building high-quality projects for your resume.
Google.preparation strategy: Focus on high-level Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA).

Google-2.Key note/How to prepare: Getting a call is highly competitive.
Google-2.preparation strategy: Optimize and refine your profile before applying via the career portal.

Microsoft.preparation strategy: Keep a close eye on opening windows in early summer.

Microsoft-2.stpiend/ctc: One of the best jobs in the country
Microsoft-2.preparation strategy: Apply directly through career portal or follow Telegram alerts for re-openings.

Uber.preparation strategy: Focus heavily on advanced Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA).

Uber-2.eligibility: 2nd year; She++ is for female candidates only
Uber-2.Key note/How to prepare: Uber Star is a diversity-focused program open to everyone.
Uber-2.preparation strategy: Check specific links usually shared on social platforms like Telegram.

Flipkart.Key note/How to prepare: A major hackathon for industry problem-solving.
Flipkart.preparation strategy: Practice building MVPs and use resources from previous winners.

Flipkart-2.timeline: February to March (Runway); Year-end (Girls Who Code)

Amazon.Key note/How to prepare: Exclusive program for female tech talent.
Amazon.preparation strategy: Apply via the dedicated Amazon WOW portal.

Amazon-2.Key note/How to prepare: Standard high-paying product role; applications close fast.
Amazon-2.preparation strategy: Monitor the Amazon careers portal regularly as links expire.

JP Morgan.Key note/How to prepare: Opportunities for international roles in London or Glasgow.
JP Morgan.preparation strategy: Watch interviews with previous winners and employees.

Walmart.Key note/How to prepare: Selection is purely based on DSA skills.
Walmart.preparation strategy: Build MVPs quickly and prepare specifically for the hackathon format.

Walmart-2.eligibility: Varies by program; typically engineering teams
Walmart-2.Key note/How to prepare: Hackathons allow you to skip initial DSA rounds.
Walmart-2.preparation strategy: Focus on rapid project building using tools like Replit.

Myntra.Key note/How to prepare: Offers extra benefits alongside the stipend.
Myntra.preparation strategy: Review previous hiring timelines and processes.

Myntra-2.eligibility: Open to all students; mostly final year
Myntra-2.preparation strategy: Focus on industrial problem-solving and development.

LinkedIn.stpiend/ctc: 1 lakh per month plus benefits like an iPhone
LinkedIn.Key note/How to prepare: High-value mentorship program often leading to PPOs.
LinkedIn.preparation strategy: Stay active on social media to catch short application windows.

LinkedIn-2.Key note/How to prepare: Direct hiring links often last only a few days.
LinkedIn-2.preparation strategy: Ensure your profile and resume are optimized for quick application.

Juspay.Key note/How to prepare: Challenges are typically hosted on Unstop or HackerEarth.
Juspay.preparation strategy: Focus on high-level programming and competitive coding.

Trilogy (CodeNation).Key note/How to prepare: Training in Dubai; highest paying role mentioned.
Trilogy (CodeNation).preparation strategy: Prepare for extremely difficult competitive programming rounds.

American Express.preparation strategy: Keep an eye on the American Express website.

American Express-2.Key note/How to prepare: Diversity focused program for female students.
American Express-2.preparation strategy: Search specifically for this program on the Amex portal.

GSOC.Key note/How to prepare: The GSOC tag is highly valued by all recruiters.
GSOC.preparation strategy: Practice proposal writing and contribute to open source early.

D.E. Shaw.Key note/How to prepare: Short program including an offline learning event.
D.E. Shaw.preparation strategy: Build your profile and share progress on social media.

Atlassian.Key note/How to prepare: Timelines may shift based on company budgets.
Atlassian.preparation strategy: Monitor for openings one month earlier or later than usual.

ServiceNow.Key note/How to prepare: Provides equal opportunity regardless of the college year.
ServiceNow.preparation strategy: Focus on diversity hiring initiatives and coding.

Cisco.preparation strategy: Apply during the spring window via the IdeaThon program.

Adobe.Key note/How to prepare: Powerful brand value to add to your application.
Adobe.preparation strategy: Strong DSA and development skills are expected.

Summer of Bitcoin.preparation strategy: Work on open-source blockchain domain projects.

RBI.eligibility: 3rd and 4th year students (Some sources say any year)
RBI.Key note/How to prepare: Opportunity to work for the Indian Government directly.
RBI.preparation strategy: Monitor for government application windows in winter.

GitHub.Key note/How to prepare: Gives preference for future Microsoft or LinkedIn roles.
GitHub.preparation strategy: Gain experience working on the GitHub ecosystem.

Agoda.preparation strategy: Prepare for a March/April application cycle.

Intuit.preparation strategy: Search the company job portal during late autumn.

Morgan Stanley.Key note/How to prepare: Highly prestigious brand for your resume.
Morgan Stanley.preparation strategy: Monitor for openings in the winter window.

Swiggy.Key note/How to prepare: Focus on practical development skills over pure DSA.

Meta.Key note/How to prepare: Competitive coding at an elite level.
Meta.preparation strategy: Participate in Facebook/Meta Hacker Cup challenges.

EY.Key note/How to prepare: Hiring is often based on projects or case studies.
EY.preparation strategy: Review previous Techathon guides to understand the format.
